ComicInfo.Title: The Case of the Forked Road
ComicInfo.Summary:
Melanie considers whether to make a play for Ryan.
Ryan comforts Amy after competitors torch her store.
Amy lends Ryan the use of an empty bedroom at her place.
Amy helps Ryan out of the bar.
Amy confronts Ryan about his overdrinking and his disgusting condition.
The girls figure out that three bad boys from school have also discovered the wormhole and are causing the variant time stream by derailing the Flying Scot in 1960. They thwart the boys and restore the time stream by the simple expedient of warning railway workers that there's an obstruction on the track. Before returning, Lottie impresses on Calvin how vital it is to tell his parents he loves them; she has found in her research that they will die one week later. Thanks to their sojourn in 1960 the girls are now avid fans of the Beetles... an all-girl group.
Mildred discovers a time portal wormhole in their school's chemistry lab. With Shauna on guard, Mildred and Lottie enter 1960, where they encounter Calvin, who has an argument with his mother. Despite doing their best to avoid affecting the timeline, they find upon returning that Shauna has a boy friend never known before to exist, while Mr. Beckwith is a drunk and Amy despises him.
The girls encounter a strange young boy wearing an obsolete version of their school's uniform, and also find that Mr. Goater has a particular interest in him. They surmise that the boy is a time traveler.
